pos_mean_info_list.mean: 反向地；在相反的位置；面对面
反对；反对派；在野党；敌对

bilingual.target: 这是两条截然相反的路线.

bilingual.source: Within a few days, the same individuals have expressed diametrically opposed in the past.
bilingual.target: 短短数日, 同一个人却说出了截然相反的话.

bilingual.source: Boredom is a door to something better, as opposed to something to be hated and escaped immediately.
bilingual.target: 无聊是一扇门，它通向更为精彩的事情；相反的，不无聊将令到事情变得令人憎恶并想到立马逃脱掉。

bilingual.source: The performances are also evil, of this character, personality diametrically opposed brothershave vivid interpretation.
bilingual.target: 亦正亦邪的表演, 将这对人品 、 性格截然相反的兄弟演绎得活灵活现.

bilingual.source: When you delegate, as opposed to dumping, you give the other person the same authority to complete the task as if you had done it yourself.
bilingual.target: 授权，与简单的分配工作相反的是，授权意味着你赋予了别人在完成这项工作时，享有了和你自己完成时同样的权利。

bilingual.source: Agreeableness concerns the degree to which individuals are cooperative, warm, and agreeable as opposed to cold, disagreeable, and antagonistic.
bilingual.target: 体现在那些富有合作精神、热情的、令人愉悦的人中；而与之相反的是冷淡的、令人厌恶的、敌对的人。
他强烈地反对这个计划。
她猛烈地反对这个计划。

bilingual.source: She is opposed to the new policy.

yingyinNormal.en: As opposed to $500,000 if it had been on contingency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果算抽成的话报酬可达五十万美元。

yingyinNormal.en: And as opposed to having you two pointing at each other, she's going to get him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与其让你们两彼此敌对，她宁愿去救他。

yingyinNormal.en: Because it makes me feel alive, as opposed to giving me the appearance of normality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有这样才能让我感到有动力，而不是让我看起来只是一个普通人。

yingyinNormal.en: You will be opposed at the Kurultai when the time comes. Kaidu, Nayan, many feel entitled to my throne.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等时机一到，会有人与你在忽邻勒塔对垒，海都，纳扬，很多自我感觉有权继位的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Jackie, you have repeatedly opposed the minimum-wage and CEO salary bill I asked the leadership to introduce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰姬，你一再反对我想让领导层推行的《最低工资和高管薪酬标准法案》。

yingyinNormal.en: In the refrigerator, as opposed to us having two separate shelves and one communal shelf, the three of us now get individual shelves and the door becomes communal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在冰箱里，我们不能再使用两个单人层和一个公用层了。现在我们三个人每人使用一层，然后冰箱门变作公用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；抵抗；反对；对立；在野党；相对；敌手；对手；反对党；冲
adj. 对抗的；对手的；相对的；对面的；相反的；对立的
adj. 反对的；相反的；对立的；敌对的
adj. 对面的；完全不同的；截然相反的；对立的；对的；对生的

sense_info_list.en: distinguished from or in contrast with

examination_example.sentence: A sacred place of peace, however crude it may be, is a distinctly human need, as <highlight>opposed</highlight> to shelter, which is a distinctly animal need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个神圣的宁静之地，无论它多么简陋，都是人类独特的需求，与之相对的避难所，则是动物特有的需求。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；抵抗；反对；对立；在野党；相对；敌手；对手；反对党；冲
adj. 反对的；相反的；对立的；敌对的
adj. 对面的；完全不同的；截然相反的；对立的；对的；对生的

sense_info_list.en: distinguished from or in contrast with

examination_example.sentence: This is <highlight>opposed</highlight> to the traditional format of presenting to the industry, taking orders for production and becoming available in six months' time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这与向行业展示、接受生产订单并在六个月内供货的传统形式相反。

examination_example.sentence: Naturally, the tobacco industry is violently <highlight>opposed</highlight>.
Republicans and insurance industry are strongly <highlight>opposed</highlight> to the creation of a public insurance plan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 共和党人和保险业强烈反对建立公共保险计划。

examination_example.sentence: Businesses are often <highlight>opposed</highlight>, fearing higher costs will make them uncompetitive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业往往会反对，担心更高的成本会使它们失去竞争力。

examination_example.sentence: Its ruling party is <highlight>opposed</highlight> to taxes and regulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其执政党反对税收和监管。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；抵抗；反对；对立；在野党；相对；敌手；对手；反对党；冲
adj. 反对的；相反的；对立的；敌对的
adj. 对面的；完全不同的；截然相反的；对立的；对的；对生的

sense_info_list.en: disagreeing strongly with sth and trying to stop it

examination_example.sentence: Why are some people <highlight>opposed</highlight> to labelling obesity as a disease?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么有些人反对将肥胖列为一种疾病？

examination_example.sentence: Luthar is not <highlight>opposed</highlight> to giving allowances.
The food industry has, in general, been firmly <highlight>opposed</highlight> to such direct government action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，食品工业一直坚决反对政府的这种直接行动。

sense_info_list.en: distinguished from or in contrast with

examination_example.sentence: On one side are white parents like Catherine Foley, a former president of the Parent-Teacher-Student Association at her daughter's middle school, who has come to see the district's increasingly pressured atmosphere as <highlight>opposed</highlight> to learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方是像凯瑟琳·福利这样的白人家长，她曾在女儿所在的中学担任家长——教师——学生协会主席。她认为，该学区日益紧张的氛围不利于孩子们学习。

examination_example.sentence: I like in-class exams because the time is already reserved, as <highlight>opposed</highlight> to using my free time at home to work on it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喜欢课内考试，因为时间已经预留好了，而不是利用我在家的空闲时间。
